thread.title: U.S. Government Bond Yields Rise With Global Stocks

author: Akane Otani
title: U.S. Government Bond Yields Rise With Global Stocks
text:
U.S. government bond prices fell Wednesday as a round of upbeat corporate earnings reports nudged most global stock indexes higher.
The yield on the benchmark 10-year U.S. Treasury note posted its biggest one-day climb in two months, settling at 2.867%, compared with 2.814% Tuesday.
Bond yields, which rise as prices fall, have notched two...
